channel.title: Need sql thing help
channel.description:
java.sql.SQLException: Access denied for user 'root'@'localhost' (using password : YES) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.checkErrorPacket(MysqlIO.java:2975) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.checkErrorPacket(MysqlIO.java:798) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.secureAuth411(MysqlIO.java:3700) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.doHandshake(MysqlIO.java:1203) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.createNewIO(Connection.java:2572) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.<init>(Connection.java:1485) at com.mysql.jdbc.NonRegisteringDriver.connect(NonRegisteringDriver.java :266)
how i can fix that

item.title: Need sql thing help
item.dc:creator: @sabsabi sabsabi
item.description:

: YES)
